name: Jordan Lee
persona: Jordan Lee is a 20-year-old Computer Science major who is currently facing significant academic challenges, reflected in a CGPA of 0.16. Jordan struggles with motivation and self-discipline, often finding it difficult to stay focused on coursework or set meaningful academic goals. While test anxiety is not a major issue, low perseverance and limited belief in their own abilities have contributed to poor performance. Jordan may benefit from academic support services and motivational counseling to help get back on track.
